## [Model based geostatistics for global public health using R](https://mbgr.quarto.pub/book)

![](globe_cs_ortho_africa.png){.border .rounded .shadow-lg width="30%"}

*Model-based Geostatistics for Global Public Health using R* (Giorgi E., Fronterre C., 2025) covers data handling, model fitting, prediction, and validation of geostatistical models using [R](https://cran.r-project.org/), with applications to public health problems. The book can be accessed freely online at this [link](https://mbgr.quarto.pub/book). 

## [Model based geostatistics for global public health: Methods and Applications](https://www.routledge.com/Model-based-Geostatistics-for-Global-Public-Health-Methods-and-Applications/Diggle-Giorgi/p/book/9781032093642?srsltid=AfmBOoorCB0EMimcXx0idtYQCMM50J-ZhORW9tsHxjSbRu8goWwe5PZF)

![](mbg.png){.border .rounded .shadow-lg width="20%"}

*Model-based Geostatistics for Global Public Health: Methods and Applications* (Diggle, P. J. and Giorgi E., 2020) provides an introductory account of model-based geostatistics, its implementation in open-source software and its application in public health research.

## [Time serie analysis: A Biostatistical Introduction](https://global.oup.com/academic/product/time-series-a-biostatistical-introduction-9780198714842?q=peter%20diggle%20time%20series&lang=en&cc=gb)

![](ts.png){.border .rounded .shadow-lg width="20%"}

*Time sries analysis: a biostatistical introduction* (Diggle, P. J. and Giorgi, E., 2024) is an introductory account of time series analysis, written from the perspective of applied statisticians whose interests lie primarily in the biomedical and health sciences.
